name: Better Days
description:
Has this year been very kind to you? Allow us to take you back to "Better Days:" where you travel backwards through the seasons and try to overcome some of the challenges that you faced over the year. Hopefully, by the end, you will be on a path to better days.

Created by:

  • Oulsen (https://oulsen.itch.io/)
  • Frostbyte (https://sam-low.itch.io/)
  • biennes10 (https://biennes.itch.io/)

This is our first gamejam and for some of us the first game we've completed. It was really fun to create this with a team, learning from each other and getting to know random people from the gamejam because we didn't know each other before the jam started.

We hope you like it :)

Created for the Brackeys Gamejam 2020.2

Assets:

  • Music - All of the music is from http://teknoaxe.com/
  • Sprites - 98% is created by our team.
  • Code - We've created everything.
  • SFX - All SFX is from https://freesound.org

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys
  • WASD
  • Mouse
